Blackfang went on top of a cliff, far from the battle. He hated the
idea to leave the newcomers in the hands of either the Rogues, whom he
considered brutal, or the Tripredacus, whom he thought were fairplay
but dangerous.

Blackfang: Commander Yggdrasil, Rodimus, Nightlight and I are
retreating due to some kind of affliction that Nightlight caught, from
what little I saw.

Yggdrasil: I read you Blackfang. Yggdrasil out.

He took his temples in his huge left hand and thought.

Yggdrasil: Devilcat, this is Yggdrasil. How is the battle going for
your troup? Give me a full sitrep, please.
